titleStmt.title: For the King, and both Houses of Parliament, sitting at Westminster, and for every member thereof to read
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed (p. 13): "... this 13th day of the 3d month, 1661. G. Fox, J. Stubbs, F. Howgil, H. Fell, R. Hubberthorn, R. Scostrop."
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
